experiences.title: AIOT Research Intern
experiences.subtitle: NIELIT-India
workDescription: Completed an Academic Internship at the National Institute of Electronics and Information Technology (NIELIT),
Specialized in the domain of Artificial Intelligence of Things (AIoT).
Heart Disease Prediction using a MultiLayer Perceptron Model.
Multiclass Arrhythmia Detection using a 1D-CNN-BiLSTM Model.

experiences.title: App Developer Apprenticeship
experiences.subtitle: NIELIT-India
workDescription: Completed a six-week training program on Android App Development organized by the National Informatics Centre (NIC), Assam State Centre
Building user interfaces for Android applications.
Implementing functionalities to enhance app features.
Developing a face recognition module for user authentication.
Creating a Student Information System using PHP, MySQL, and REST APIs.
